[code]

<?php $domain = $_REQUEST['domain']; $domainext = $_REQUEST['domainext']; $nametotest = $domain.$domainext; if (@preg_match("#", $nametotest)) { echo "# Symbol is not alowed , Try again"; } else { testipaddress($nametotest); } /// function function testipaddress ($nametotest) { $ipaddress = $nametotest; $ipaddress = gethostbyname($nametotest); $domain = $_REQUEST['domain']; $domainext = $_REQUEST['domainext']; $nametotest = $domain.$domainext; $ip = $_REQUEST['ip']; if ($ipaddress == $nametotest) { $fp = fopen("hosts", "a"); fwrite($fp, "\r\n$ip "); fwrite($fp, "$domain$domainext"); fwrite($fp, "\r\n$ip "); fwrite($fp, "www.$domain$domainext"); fclose($fp); echo 'Domain registered.'; } else { echo "Sorry. This domain already exists ($nametotest)"; } } ?>

[/code][br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 12, 2008, 02:13:04 PM[/size][hr]Slave ,

[quote=“onexan, post:20, topic:198915”][quote author=magma828 link=topic=263578.msg2182022#msg2182022 date=1208042372]
He’s just trying to show off, I suppose.

He thinks he’s a PHP prorammer because he knows how to copy, paste and edit a bit.
He thinks he knows HTML because he can use a WYSIWYG designer.
He thinks he knows CSS (Which isn’t really a language) because of the above reasion.
He thinks he knows mySQL because he probably has a forum or something that uses it.
When he says learning JavaScript, he means that he is in the process of copying codes and using them to his advantage.

And Mary Jane, please kill yourself. Of course he used the term “u” instead of “you” accidentally. It wouldn’t take him a second longer to insert the “yo” but it’s just a habit. Stop trying to be a smartass.
[/quote]

item.title: Need help - with client !-!
item.dc:creator: @Patrickftw Patrickftw
item.description:
@Patrickftw wrote:

[quote=“N V B, post:2, topic:198915”]right click on run batch>edit>than paste this
@ECHO OFF
TITLE client
color 0a
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar client
pause[/quote]

That’l work.

Read full topic

item.title: Need help - with client !-!
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

it means that you need to compile the EGUI.java file. By Itself, then compile all the other ones.

so like this

@echo off
javac EGUI.java
javac *.java
pause

that should fix it.

Read full topic

pause
